item.title: By: On Breaking Rules: The Debate – Luna Station Quarterly
item.dc:creator: On Breaking Rules: The Debate – Luna Station Quarterly
item.description: […] talking about The Debate and how to (not) use it in your story. So let’s say you’ve established The Normal World and told us everything we need to know about our hero. Now it’s time to get to the action. The […]

item.title: By: suzmuse
item.dc:creator: suzmuse
item.description: ooooo, intrigued by this book (going back to goodreads to add it) and by using this premise in my own writing! thanks!
